. Treatment may last as long as two years in some patients. People with HE who experience repeated HE relapses, do not respond to steroids, and/or cannot tolerate steroid treatment have been treated with other immunosuppressive medications such as azathioprine and cyclophosphamide. Intravenous immunoglobulin, and plasmapheresis have also been used.",GARD,Hashimoto's encephalitis
What is (are) Mosaic trisomy 9 ?,"Mosaic trisomy 9 is a chromosomal abnormality that can affect may parts of the body.
